stretches.name: Wrist Rolls
stretches.description: Rotate wrists in circles, first clockwise, then counterclockwise.

stretches.name: Shoulder Circles
stretches.description: Draw large circles with arms at shoulder height.

stretches.name: Neck Tilts
stretches.description: Tilt head to one side and hold for 5 seconds.

stretches.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
stretches.description: Inhale and arch back (Cow), exhale and round spine (Cat).

stretches.name: Hip Circles
stretches.description: Rotate hips in circles with hands on hips.

stretches.name: Harmstring Stretch
stretches.description: Hinge forward from hips to touch toes.

stretches.name: Ankle Rolls
stretches.description: Rotate ankles in circles, clockwise then counterclockwise.
stretches.advice: Controlled movements, full range of motion.

stretches.name: Side Lunges
stretches.description: Step one foot out, lower towards bent leg, back straight.
stretches.advice: Keep movements steady, avoid knee over toes.

stretches.name: Elbow Extends
stretches.description: Bend and straighten elbows as if doing a biceps curl.

stretches.name: Skate Kicks
stretches.description: Pull foot towards glutes while balancing on one leg.
stretches.duration: Hold for 15 to 20 seconds per leg.
stretches.advice: Use wall for balance, avoid arching back.

stretches.name: Step-Back Lunges
stretches.description: Step back into lunge, lower body until back knee nearly touches the ground.
stretches.advice: Front knee over ankle, engage core.

stretches.name: Calf Roll Downs
stretches.description: Rise onto toes, hold, then roll back down.

stretches.name: Deep Squat Hold
stretches.description: Squat down with feet wider than shoulder-width, heels on ground.
stretches.advice: Focus on hip opening, knees tracking over toes.
